runs.comm: full and bit of swing into the left hander, pushed to mid-on
good length, drifting into Gilchrist, no room to cut, played back to the bowler
that was a Jaffa! good length on the corridor outside off, shapes away just a touch, Gilchrist sticks his bat out and the ball just beats the bat
dropped, touch chance at slip, outside edge goes high to Alok Kapali, he gets a hand to it and the ball rebounds off his fingers and goes to third man
hayden takes a couple of paces forward as the bowler delivers, beats him, keeper collects it
beaten again, fuller in length outside off, attempted off drive
bit of width outside off and shaping away, Gilchrist cuts past the covers, the fielder at the deep stops it
good length, on the stumps, pushed back to Rasel
full and driven past Rasel, long-off stops it, Ashraful goes on the defensive with this field
wide outside off, hayden has a wild swing, misses it
overpitched, on the pads, Hayden lofts over deep midwicket, Australia are underway
good length on the stumps, pushed back to Rasel
wow! pitches just outside off on a good length, Hayden gets on his knee and sweeps over deep square leg
pushed back to the bowler
overpitched outside off, asking to be driven, Hayden opens the face and drives past cover and point, the ball just races away
Mortaza is punished for pitching it too short, hayden has time to rock on the backfoot and execute a short arm pull past midwicket
driven back to the bowler
short of a length, hayden goes for another pull, swings blindly and misses, just a lapse in concentration
sliding down leg, Hayden glances past short fine leg and that completes an expensive over
good length outside off, played back to Rasel
full, on the pads, driven down to mid-on
loud appeal but turned down! hayden tries to work it to the on side off his pads, struck on the pads, inside edge is our guess
good length on off stump, Hayden has all the time in the world to get in position to swing across the line and cart it over cow corner on the on side
full and uppishly driven to covers, the fielders were excited for a couple of seconds
good length doesnt seem to work for Rasel as Hayden helps himself to another boundry on the on side, swings across the line and the ball races away to long leg
short and wide outside off, square cut, the ball screams past mid-off and cover
good length on off stump, driven back to Mortaza
outside off, good length, left alone to Rahim
good length outside off, Hayden shapes to cut square but ends up chopping the ball to point
short of a length and Hayden executes a tennis style backhand stroke, the ball races past Mortaza and mid-on
pushed to the off side for a single
flighted on off and middle, Hayden comes forward and drives to mid-off
fired in flatter on off stump, Hayden gives the charge and drives past mid-off and cover
flighted on off stump, full in length, driven hard to cover
flighted on middle and leg, Hayden takes a few paces forward and drives to mid-on, quick single taken
short of a lengtht, fired in on middle, Gilchrist tries to nudge to the on side
Free Hit, Gilchrist scoops that from middle stump and lofts over deep midwicket, makes full use of the free hit
flighted on off stump, turns in, played back to the bowler
pushed to long-on for a single
tossed up outside off, hardly any pace on that, glanced off an open face to third man
full and pushed to long-on
flighted outside off, comes forward and pushes to long-off
pushed back to the bowler
reverse sweep, hayden ends up paddling it to short third-man
pushed in flatter on off stump, played to the on side
steps down the track and swings to deep midwicket
on middle and off, Gilchrist takes a few paces forward, checks his stroke in the last microsecond and lofts over cow corner
pushed to the off side
short of a length on middle and leg, swung to fine leg
short of a length outside off, cut to cover
dabbed with an open face to third man, the fielder at the deep pulls it just before the rope
pushed to the covers
flighted on middle and off, advances down the track and lofts over the bowler's head, goes a few rows back
flighted outside off, pushed to the off side
glanced with an open face to short third man
wide outside off and cut away past point, that's a half-century for Hayden
swing and a miss, tries to cart that one over midwicket, rare lapse in concentration
attempted sweep, hit low on the pads, Razzak appeals, may have been struck outside the line
pushed back to the bowler
fullish and driven to cover
punched off the backfoot to midwicket
drops the first one short, Gilchrist rocks back and pulls to deep midwicket
drags it short down leg side, Hayden moves across and pulls to long leg
Hayden backs away and tries to hammer the ball through cover, he gets beaten
Hayden cuts behind point and sprints through for two more
Hayden charges down the track and hits powerfully straight past the bowler, that raced away to the boundary
he tries to sweep this time but the ball keeps low and Hayden gets beaten
defended on the front foot to cover
Gilchrist charges down the track and lofts the ball cleanly over the head of the fielder at long-off, that's his fourth six
cut off the back foot past point, Gilchrist calls for the second, the throw is good from the deep and Mushfiqur whips off the bails with Gilchrist an inch short of the ground
he's off the mark straight away with an off drive to long-off
cut off the back foot in front of point for a single
tossed up on off stump, Ponting leans forward and plays it with an open face towards backward point
bowled flat through the air on middle stump, Ponting leans forward and closes the face to play the ball through midwicket
Hayden steps down the pitch, gets to the pitch of a flighted delivery, frees his arms and sends the ball flying over the straight boundary, sheer muscle that was
Hayden gets down on one knee and drives powerfully through cover point for four more
played off the pads to short fine leg
flicked off the pads through midwicket
Hayden takes a step down and lofts to long-off
Mortaza surprises Hayden with a bouncer that is pulled awkwardly to square leg
a slower bouncer outside off stump, Ponting was very early on the pull and the ball went under his bat
defended on the back foot towards cover
driven off the back foot to cover point, Ponting's taking his time with these two runs
short ball outside the off stump, Ponting moves across towards the off side and pulls the ball through midwicket for an easy two runs to complete a comfortable victory
